scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: rem devenv Core.UI.Gen.sln /build Release pushd D:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\vc call vcvarsall.bat x86 popd msbuild.exe Core.UI.Gen.sln /t:build /p:Configuration=Release

SET PATH=C:\Python27\;C:\Python27\Scripts\;%PATH% set STC_SRC_PATH=%WORKSPACE% set STC_REL_PATH=%WORKSPACE%\bin\Release rd /s /q CCPApplication hg clone http://mercurial.cal.ci.spirentcom.com/CCPApplication/

SET PATH=C:\Python27\;C:\Python27\Scripts\;%PATH% set STC_SRC_PATH=%WORKSPACE% set STC_REL_PATH=%WORKSPACE%\bin\Release cd CCPApplication dir media\scripts\provmanager.js echo "c:\Python27\Scripts\scons.bat" cmd /k c:\Python27\Scripts\scons.bat cd provmanager echo "set_version.bat %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%" set_version.bat %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import os import sys import subprocess import shutil
# retrieving the current STC build number # pattern='STC_Build=' branchID='6' # fin = open(os.environ['WORKSPACE'] + "/stc"+os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION']+".ver", "r") # for line in fin.readlines(): # if pattern in line: # print line # line = line.replace(pattern,'') # buildno = line.rstrip() #fin.close stc_build_num_raw = os.environ['BLL_BUILD_NUMBER'] + branchID stc_build_num = stc_build_num_raw.zfill(4) print "Build Number is " + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "." + stc_build_num os.environ['STC_BUILD_NUMBER'] = stc_build_num fullnum = stc_build_num + "0000" print "Full version number is " + fullnum
# call setver.py for STC files in CCP os.system("cd") os.chdir("CCPApplication\\provmanager\stc") print "python ..\\..\\..\\framework\\tools\\buildUtil\\setver.py " + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + " " + fullnum #os.system("python ..\\..\\..\\framework\\tools\\buildUtil\\setver.py os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] " + fullnum); # trying out using subprocess sys.stdout.flush() retcode = subprocess.call(["Python.exe", "..\\..\\..\\framework\\tools\\buildUtil\\setver.py", os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'], fullnum]) print "setver returned: "+str(retcode)
# generate installer for the build ws = os.environ['WORKSPACE'] os.chdir(ws) ci_installer_cmd = "perl " + ws + "/Build_Scripts/STC_Build_Scripts/ci_packageinstaller.pl " + ws + " " + ws + "/Installer" + " " + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "." + stc_build_num + " PACKAGE_DMCP " + ws ci_installer_cmd.replace('/', '\\') print "Executing " + ci_installer_cmd sys.stdout.flush() os.system(ci_installer_cmd)
# copy the final installer to \\martin and \\spccafs03 ws.replace('/', '\\') ccp_installer = ws + "\\Installer\\Cloud Core Provisioning.exe" martin_dir = "\\\\martin\\archive\\pv\\TestCenter\\" + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "\\Engineering_Builds\\GUI_BLL\\" + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "." + stc_build_num fs03_dir = "\\\\spccalfs03\\development\\scm\\release\\STC\\" + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "\\" + os.environ['STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION'] + "." + stc_build_num
# make sure target directory exists before copying file if os.path.exists(martin_dir): print "srcdir: ", martin_dir, " exists" else: try: print "creating: ", martin_dir sys.stdout.flush() pipe = subprocess.Popen(["cmd", "/c", "mkdir", martin_dir], stdin=subprocess.PIPE) pipe.wait() pipe.stdin.close() except IOError, e: print "Unable to create directory. %s" % e
print "Copying " + ccp_installer + " to " + martin_dir shutil.copy(ccp_installer, martin_dir)
# make sure target directory exists before copying file if os.path.exists(fs03_dir): print "srcdir: ", fs03_dir, " exists" else: try: print "creating: ", fs03_dir sys.stdout.flush() pipe = subprocess.Popen(["cmd", "/c", "mkdir", fs03_dir], stdin=subprocess.PIPE) pipe.wait() pipe.stdin.close() except IOError, e: print "Unable to create directory. %s" % e
print "Copying " + ccp_installer + " to " + fs03_dir shutil.copy(ccp_installer, fs03_dir )

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command: echo "END" rem cd provmanager\stc rem SET FULLNUM=0%BUILD_NUMBER%60000 rem if %BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 99 SET FULLNUM=%BUILD_NUMBER%30000 rem echo %FULLNUM% rem SET FULLVER=00%BUILD_NUMBER%6 rem if %BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 9 SET FULLVER=0%BUILD_NUMBER%3 rem if %BUILD_NUMBER% gtr 99 SET FULLVER=%BUILD_NUMBER%3 rem echo FULLVER is %FULLVER% rem python ..\..\framework\tools\buildUtil\setver.py "4.20" %FULLNUM% rem cd %WORKSPACE% rem perl %WORKSPACE%\Build_Scripts\STC_Build_Scripts\ci_packageinstaller.pl %WORKSPACE% %WORKSPACE%\Installer %STC_MAJ_MIN_VERSION%.%FULLVER% PACKAGE_DMCP %WORKSPACE%
